Text.Name: BodyPractice_Attitude_Atk
Text.Desc: Fully focused on attacking the enemy's physical body. In this stance, the secret body's attack performance is increased by 25% and defense performance is reduced by 50%.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_Attitude_Normal
Text.Desc: Uses the standard stance for physical cultivators to engage in battle, well-balanced in every aspects.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_Attitude_ManJi
Text.Desc: Uses the strong battle will to command the whole body to move and directly attack the enemy's physical body, drastically increasing the attack ability while maintaining instinctual defense. The secret body's attack performance is increased by 30% and defense performance is reduced by 25%.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_Attitude_WangZhe
Text.Desc: Stays calm and composed while facing the battle with the heart of a king. The secret body's attack performance is increased by 15%, defense performance increased by 15% and consumption reduced by 20%.

Text.Name: BodyPractice_DefenseDebuff
Text.Desc: Having exhausted True Qi, the physical cultivator falls into a weakened state, all stats reduced by 90%.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_AngerFire
Text.Desc: Remembers the sealed painful memories and fully activates all the body functions within a period of time.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Magic_JingXi
Text.Desc: The heart and lungs are overload after using Whale Breathing and the breathing efficiency is drastically reduced.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Magic_TunJin
Text.Desc: Accelerates the consumption of lifespan and draws Primordial Qi from the void to replenish for the hunger.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Magic_XiuFu
Text.Desc: Transports energy throughout the whole body to accelerate the recovery of the injuries.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Magic_ChiYi1
Text.Desc: Uses the True Qi generated by the Rejected Body to run through the body and drastically increase the consumption rate of lifespan and remold speed.

Text.Name: Modifier_BodyPractice_Magic_ChiYi2
Text.Desc: Uses the True Qi generated by the Rejected Body to run through the body and drastically increase the consumption rate of lifespan and the chance of advanced evolution directions to occur in remolding.
